#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
bool compare(pair<ll,ll> a,pair<ll,ll> b)
{
	if(a.first>b.first) return true;
	else if(a.first==b.first) {
		if(a.second  < b.second) return true;
	}
 
	return false;
}
int main()
{
	long long int n,a,b; cin>>n;
	pair<unsigned long long int ,unsigned long long int> S[n+1];
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		unsigned long long k=a*b;
		S[i].first=k;
		S[i].second=i+1;
		
	}
	sort(S,S+n,compare);
	
    long int q,f;
    cin>>q;
    while(q--)
    {
    	cin>>a;
    	cout<<S[a-1].second<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
